page.title: 07A COUNTRY DOCTOR'S DAY
page.content: The doctor arrives between 7:00am (0700)and 8:00am(0800)in order to start his morning surgery between 8:30 /9:00(0830/0900).Morning surgery finishes(on average)at about 1:00pm (1300).After morning surgery,he does his visits in the after_noon.He then tries to be back at the surgery for about 4:30pm(16:30).Evening surgery is usually conducted between4:30_6:30pm (16:30_18:30),and the Doctor is usually able to go home at about 7:00 pm(19:00). {ACCIDENTS On average, there is normally only one{ EMERGENCY}a week.The nearest hospital is at near-by{East {Grinstead}(3.5 miles away) where there is a Casualty Department but the nearest{ACCIDENT}hospital is in Tunbridge Wells (12.5 miles away).
